name: Kotlin Site Dark Design v2017.2
description:
This is the dark mode for the official Kotlin language site (kotlinlang.org). Code snippets highlighting similar to Intellij IDEA Darcula theme.
Github repo is here.
additional_info:
Please inform me about any issues and errors. I will fix them as soon as possible.
v2017.2 - minor fixes.

discussions.name: I like most of it, but had to redo nav buttons.
Mismatch colors in a code snippet
